- This Mobile Application is maintained and content provided by Karnataka Appellate Tribunal.Though all efforts have been made to ensure the accuracy and currency of the content on this Application, the same should not be construed as a statement of law or used for any legal purposes. 
In case of any ambiguity or doubts, users are advised to verify / check with the Department(s) and / or other source(s), and to obtain appropriate professional advice.


- Under no circumstances will this Department be liable for any expense, loss or damage including, without limitation, indirect or consequential loss or damage, or any expense, loss or damage whatsoever arising from use, or loss of use, of data, arising out of or in connection with the use of this Application. 
These terms and conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the Indian Laws.


- Any dispute arising under these terms and conditions shall be subject to the jurisdiction of the courts of India. The information posted on this Application could include hypertext links or pointers to information created and maintained by non-Government / private organizations.


- Copyright Office is providing these links and pointers solely for your information and convenience. When you select a link to an outside Application, you are leaving the Copyright Office website and are subject to the privacy and security policies of the owners/sponsors of the outside Application. Copyright Office, does not guarantee the availability of such linked pages at all times.


- Copyright Office cannot authorize the use of copyrighted materials contained in linked Application. Users are advised to request such authorization from the owner of the linked Application. Copyright Office, does not guarantee that linked Application comply with Indian Government Web Guidelines.
